Sentencas: This paper develops a new thermodynamic model that predicts maximum fuel-cell efficiency and fuel utilization as a function of fuel composition and operating conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamics of SOFC efficiency and fuel utilization as functions of fuel mixtures and operating conditions

Sentencas: Interestingly, it is shown that maximum possible efficiency is independent of membrane-electrode assembly characteristics and internal polarization losses.
Titulo: Thermodynamics of SOFC efficiency and fuel utilization as functions of fuel mixtures and operating conditions

Sentencas: However, because the power density depends on internal polarization losses, the cell size needed to achieve maximum efficiency depends greatly on cell architecture.
Titulo: Thermodynamics of SOFC efficiency and fuel utilization as functions of fuel mixtures and operating conditions

Sentencas: A very detailed fuel-cell model is used to validate the thermodynamic model and to provide further insight on practical considerations such as power density.
Titulo: Thermodynamics of SOFC efficiency and fuel utilization as functions of fuel mixtures and operating conditions

Sentencas: The model is illustrated using solid-oxide fuel cell examples.
Titulo: Thermodynamics of SOFC efficiency and fuel utilization as functions of fuel mixtures and operating conditions
